main.gol.controller.util

Class Draw

  • java.lang.Object
    • main.gol.controller.util.Draw

  • public class Draw
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used for drawing graphics to the GUI canvas.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext context, Colors colors)
      This constructor takes the graphicsContext and colors as inputParameters to instantiate new Draw objects.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods Deprecated Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void drawBoard(java.util.List<java.util.List<Cell>> board)
      This method draws the entire Grid to canvas.
      void drawCell(Cell cell)
      This method draw individual cells to the canvas triggered by canvas mouse-events.
      void drawFixedBoard(Cell[][] board)
      Deprecated.  
      void drawGeneration(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> gen)
      This method draws next generation of Cells to canvas.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • Draw

        public Draw(javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext context,
            Colors colors)
        This constructor takes the graphicsContext and colors as inputParameters to instantiate new Draw objects. The constructor enables method calls for drawing individual cells or the entire board drawBoard to its context with defined colors.
        Parameters:
        context - GraphicsContext
        colors - Colors

    • Method Detail

      • drawBoard

        public void drawBoard(java.util.List<java.util.List<Cell>> board)
        This method draws the entire Grid to canvas. Takes a 2Dimensional "ListOfLists" as inputParameter. and the Graphic getContext.
        Parameters:
        board - List

      • drawFixedBoard

        public void drawFixedBoard(Cell[][] board)
        Deprecated. 
        This method draws entire (old deprecated) drawBoard to canvas. Takes a 2Dimensional array as inputParameter.
        Parameters:
        board - Cell[][]

      • drawCell

        public void drawCell(Cell cell)
        This method draw individual cells to the canvas triggered by canvas mouse-events. The drawCell is toggled to dead/alive by clicking on the canvas cell coordinate. Sets 'dead' cells to the drawBoard background color, and 'alive' cells to defined cell color.
        Parameters:
        cell - Cell

      • drawGeneration

        public void drawGeneration(java.util.ArrayList<Cell> gen)
        This method draws next generation of Cells to canvas.
        Parameters:
        gen - ArrayList
